entries.title_d: The Yavin Mining Company has been having problems with the crazed, debris cult demanding that they leave the area immediately. Despite the company telling the cult that they have nothing to do with the salvage operation underway in the Yavin system, the cult has continued its harrasment of company operations. Recently the cult has captured one of the mining company executives and is threatening to kill him unless their demands are met. The Yavin mining company wants you to find and resuce their executive. The debris cult has not covered their steps very well and the mining company has located the source of the cults demands. They think that inspecting that vessel will be a good start to finding their missing executive.
entries.title: Yavin System: Inspect the Debris Cult Communication Vessel
entries.quest_location_d: The source of the broadcasts is coming from within the Yavin system. Always in the same location so the ship should not be hard to find.
entries.quest_inspect_t: Inspect the Debris Cult Communication Vessel
entries.quest_inspect_d: Once you have located the Debris Cult Communication Vessel, inspect its computers to see if there are any leads to the location of the hostage.
entries.quest_dock_t: Dock with the Debris Cult Communication Vessel
entries.quest_dock_d: Use the dock command to transfer the lead to your vessel.
